Our Business Ventures

Building diverse businesses and creating value in Jefferson City and beyond

Founded and operated by Caleb Michael McGennis, these businesses represent innovation, quality, and commitment to excellence in Central Missouri.

Industry: Process Management & Documentation

Simplifying complex processes and making procedures accessible to everyone. We help businesses and individuals understand and document workflows, making operations more efficient and transparent.

Meet The Founder

McGennis Family Businesses in Jefferson City, Missouri

Caleb Michael McGennis operates multiple successful businesses in Jefferson City, Missouri and beyond. His ventures include BXP (technology and innovation), The Honey Homestead (natural honey and homestead products), What's the Process for (process management), Toxic Tournaments (esports), Nostalgia Nuke (retro gaming content), and LoHP (project management quick wins).
